Pixel.description: Pixel-art based social media application with a React frontend and Firebase backend. Users create a drawing each day to be shared with their followers.

OCR_Encryption.description: Javascript (React) application demonstrating Optical Character Recognition (OCR) using the Tesseract.js library to recogize text and perform a basic private key cipher or decipher on it.

Wither.description: Full-stack Twitter parody application. Utilizes React, Node.js + Express.js, and MongoDB.

Admin_Dashboard.description: Pure Javascript, HTML, and CSS portfolio page. Design adapted from The Odin Project.

Digit_Classifier.description: Pytorch implementation of a basic Digit Classifier using the MNIST dataset. Includes a drawing application to draw attempted digits and classify them in real time.

Note_Hub.description: Repository containing links to all online notes I have taken at UCLA. Intended for public use for any student interested in the topics or seeking a study aid.
